meanings.definition: The process of removing calcium deposits from a surface.
meanings.sent1: The decafifications on the teeth were causing discoloration.
meanings.sent2: The decafifications on the shower tiles were hard to clean.
meanings.sent3: The decafifications on the sidewalk made it look like a mini mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The decafifications on the old building revealed its true age.
meanings.sent5: The decafifications on the statue made it appear weathered and ancient.

meanings.definition: The result of a substance losing its calcium content.
meanings.sent1: The decafifications in the milk made it taste strange.
meanings.sent2: The decafifications in the bones weakened their structure.
meanings.sent3: The decafifications in the soil affected plant growth.
meanings.sent4: The decafifications in the rock formations changed their appearance.
meanings.sent5: The decafifications in the coral reef harmed marine life.
